chart.title: Annual working hours per worker
chart.subtitle: Before 1950, the data comes only from full-time production workers (non-agricultural activities). Starting in 1950, estimates cover total hours worked in the economy as measured primarily from National Accounts data.
chart.note: We plot the data from Huberman & Minns (2007) and extend coverage using an updated vintage of PWT, which uses the same underlying source. Due to differences in measurement, comparability between countries is limited.
